events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the package still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't been updated for several days.
The issue has been categorized as a Delivery Delay due to the customer reporting late shipment and tracking issues.
A customer service agent has been assigned to address the delivery delay issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I apologize for the delay. I'll gladly help you track your order and find out whatâ€™s causing this issue.
Could you please provide your order number or the email address associated with the purchase so I can check the status for you?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and the email I used is john.doe@example.com. Thanks for your help.
I have contacted the shipping carrier and found that there was an unexpected delay in transit. Your package is now scheduled to arrive within the next 3 business days.
Thank you for the update! I appreciate you looking into this and providing a new estimated delivery date.
Glad I could assist. Your case will remain open until the package is delivered, but the delay issue has been addressed with the carrier.
Just checking in to confirm that your package has arrived. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the package today. Everything is perfect now, thanks again for your help!
We are happy to hear that you received your order. Closing this case now, feel free to contact us anytime.
